name: Bugoss Fight
description:
A insane single boss fight with the big Bugoss!

THERE'S ALSO A DOWNLOAD VERSION, MUCH BETTER WITH LESS LAG.

Avoid the bugs, accept the bug, love it or hate it, they're everywhere, so choose your destiny and fight with all you go, because it's not gonna be easy!

A simple game created in 3 days by Leonardo Fraga (me \o/) for the

WOWIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE JAM 2 

Organized by Jonas Tyrolle.
